moreKeys.requestFilters:
_type
玄幻奇幻::/xuanhuan
武侠仙侠::/xianxia
都市言情::/dushi
历史军事::/lishi
科幻传奇::/kehuan
恐怖灵异::/kongbu
其他类型::/qita

searchBook.author: //p[1]
searchBook.requestInfo:
@js:
let url = "https://www.damixs.co"
let js = `
let token = document.getElementsByName("_token")[0].value
let xhr = new XMLHttpRequest()
xhr.open("POST","https://www.damixs.co/search",false)
xhr.setRequestHeader("Content-Type","application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
xhr.send("_token="+token+"&kw=${params.keyWord}")
xhr.responseText
`
return {url:url,webView:true,webViewJs:js,webViewSkipUrls:["js"],cacheTime:0}
